channel.title: Sound delay
channel.description:
Hi, thanks for game.
Bug: every sound effects (steps,gunshot,reloading) are a bit resynchronized. It could be 0,2-0.5sec late i guess. Not much but enough to feel odd. I dont have this problem in any other game. Not even source-based ones like TF2 or HL2.
My specs: Core 2 Quad, HD5850, Win7 64bit, Creative Xfi, 4G ram DDR2
